WorkItem.Description:
I was playing with the SqlTransactionRepository.Save(...) method and I received an unhandled exception.

The exception occurs in the OopFactory.X12.Sql project in the IIdProvider.cs file line 169.

The SQL statement declared on line 145 clearly has 3 string arguments to be replaced {0}, {1} and {2}. On line 169 as part of string.format(...) only one of the 3 defined arguments are provided.
